bibl.title: The Receivers of Berenike. New Inscriptions from the 2015 Season.
bibl.note: 1. Dedication to Isis the Nurse Goddess by the Secretary of the Receiver's Department. 24 June AD 49. - 2. Dedication of a Statue of the Receiver of Berenike. 25 July AD 112. - Isis lactans. - The Receiver (παραλήμπτης) of Berenike. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Rodney Ast & Roger S. Bagnall, The Receivers of Berenike. New Inscriptions from the 2015 Season.

1. Dedication to Isis the Nurse Goddess by the Secretary of the Receiver's Department. 24 June AD 49. - 2. Dedication of a Statue of the Receiver of Berenike. 25 July AD 112. - Isis lactans. - The Receiver (παραλήμπτης) of Berenike. - Conclusion.
